title: Tuna Salad Composée
directions: Mix all the ingredients well with a fork in a medium-size, nonreactive bowl. Taste and adjust the lemon juice and pepper. The salad can be made up to 3 days in advance and refrigerated.
ingredients: 10 to 12 ounces good-quality solid tuna packed in olive oil, well drained
2 scallions washed, trimmed and chopped fine
¼ cup roasted or smoked almonds, chopped roughly, or a small handful toasted pine nuts
¼ cup good-quality olive oil (or the oil the tuna was packed in)
1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice or more to taste
¼ to ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
